name: Spider Fall
description:
You have angered the moon! He has destroyed your web and has sent his best general Sir Birdington. Avoid the general's attacks and grapple onto falling branches!

This game's main mechanic is a grapple that pulls you toward the nearest branch! I challenge you to find the 3 secret moves!

The implementation of the limitation is that you fall infinitely as there is no ground!

Note that there is a bug where if two branches are bunched together it may not grapple.
